title: NIKE V-SERIES PROMOTIONAL MATERIAL , UNKNOWN FONT ?
content:
Does anybody have any idea what this small typeface is?

Sorry for the poor quality of the image , i photographed  
a page in a book .....

Many Thanks! in advance to anybody that can help in the identification  
or recommendation of a similar font ...

thanks  
Ash.

 [‹ ID SAGMEISTER](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213059/http:/typophile.com/node/44410 "Go to previous forum topic") [Curly and fun...it looks to be modified font..can you help me? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213059/http:/typophile.com/node/44382 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ashleyco

comments.content: I don’t know what it is, but it sort of reminds me of [Pragmata](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213059/http:/www.fsd.it/fonts/pragma.htm).
